summary: Auction app: teams view shows players; add auction bidding controls and enhancements.
architectural_notes: Support configurable bid increment (e.g., 0.2cr) applied on each bid after auction start.

existing_features.title: Add an auction setting that can be enabled when an admin starts an auction to enforce a fixed bid increment of 0.2 Cr for every bid placed after the auction starts.
Update the auction dialog UI to support the fixed +0.2 Cr bidding flow, including start-auction controls and bid input behavior.
Update frontend React Query hooks and generated backend types/interfaces to support the new auction start parameters and the extended auction state.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an option so that once the auction starts, each team bid increases the bidding amount by 0.2cr (fixed increment per bid).
Enforce the fixed +0.2 Cr increment rule in the backend bidding logic so invalid bid amounts are rejected server-side.

projectName: Add optional fixed +0.2 Cr bid increment for auctions
